mapper.select: SELECT A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.CLAIM_NO, A.PRO_PROBLEM, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.CUSTOMER_ID, A.CUSTOMER_NAME, A.CUST_EMP_NO, A.CUST_TEL, A.LAST_USER_ID, A.LAST_USER, A.CREATE_EMP_NO, A.LAST_USER_TEL, A.CONTRACT_VOLUME, A.OBJECTION_NUM, A.BATTEN_PLATE_NO, A.ORIGINAL_CAR_NO, A.LAST_USER_ADDR, A.CONTRACT_NO, A.CLAIM_TYPE, A.DESIGNATION, A.SIZE_MARK, A.REPORT_PICTURE, A.DISSENTING_UNIT, A.OBJECTION_CONFIRMATION, A.CLAIM_DESC, B.FIELD_CONCLUSION_TEXT, B.FIELD_CONCLUSION_PHOTO, B.LOGISTICS_PROCESS, B.END_PROCESSING_TECH, B.DEFECT_NAME, B.PRODUCT_DT, B.SHIFT, B.INQUIRE_INFO, B.FIELD_CONCLUSION, B.USER_REQUIREMENT, B.HANDING_SUGGESTION, B.INQUIRE_STATE, B.FOLLOW_REASON, B.REJECT_REASON, B.SALES_MANAGER_SUGGESTS, B.INQUIRE_INFO_ALL, B.AMOUNT_OF_USE, B.ARRIVAL_TIME, B.AGREEMENT_CONTENT, B.AGREEMENT_AMOUNT, C.OUT_INQUIRE_FACT, C.CLAIM_CONFIRM, C.CLAIM_VERDICT, C.IMPROVEMENT, C.MEMO, C.PRODUCTION_PROCESS_INVESTIGATI, C.PRODUCTION_PROCESS_PHOTO, C.QUALITY_GRADE, C.ORIGINAL_JUDGEMENT_RESULT, C.SURFACE_STRUCTURE, C.INVESTIGATION_UNIT, C.RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT, C.PRODUCTION_PROCESS_TEXT, C.PRODUCTION_PROCESS_ALL FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE B ON A.CLAIM_NO = B.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE C ON A.CLAIM_NO = C.CLAIM_NO WHERE A.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE (SID, CLAIM_NO, LOGISTICS_PROCESS, END_PROCESSING_TECH, DEFECT_NAME, PRODUCT_DT, SHIFT, FIELD_CONCLUSION, USER_REQUIREMENT, HANDING_SUGGESTION, INQUIRE_STATE, FOLLOW_REASON, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DT, VERSION, INQUIRE_INFO,REJECT_REASON AMOUNT_OF_USE,SALES_MANAGER_SUGGESTS,INQUIRE_INFO_PHOTO, INQUIRE_INFO_TEXT,INQUIRE_INFO_ALL,FIELD_CONCLUSION_TEXT, FIELD_CONCLUSION_PHOTO ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{inquireInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{amountOfUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{salesManagerSuggests,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inquireInfoPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquireInfoText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inquireInfoAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fieldConclusionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fieldConclusionPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE
SID,
CLAIM_NO,
LOGISTICS_PROCESS,
END_PROCESSING_TECH,
DEFECT_NAME,
PRODUCT_DT,
SHIFT,
FIELD_CONCLUSION,
USER_REQUIREMENT,
HANDING_SUGGESTION,
INQUIRE_STATE,
FOLLOW_REASON,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DT,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DT,
VERSION,
INQUIRE_INFO,
REJECT_REASON,
AMOUNT_OF_USE,
SALES_MANAGER_SUGGESTS,
INQUIRE_INFO_PHOTO,
INQUIRE_INFO_TEXT,
INQUIRE_INFO_ALL,
FIELD_CONCLUSION_TEXT,
FIELD_CONCLUSION_PHOTO,
ARRIVAL_TIME,
AGREEMENT_CONTENT,
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT,
#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{followReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{inquireInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amountOfUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{salesManagerSuggests,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireInfoPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireInfoText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireInfoAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{agreementAmount ,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mapper.update:
update CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE
set version = version + 1,
LOGISTICS_PROCESS = #{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT_OF_USE = #{amountOfUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
END_PROCESSING_TECH = #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFECT_NAME = #{proProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DT = #{productDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_INFO = #{inquireInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CONCLUSION = #{fieldConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_REQUIREMENT = #{userRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDING_SUGGESTION = #{handingSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_STATE = #{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLLOW_REASON = #{followReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_MANAGER_SUGGESTS = #{salesManagerSuggests,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_INFO_PHOTO = #{inquireInfoPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_INFO_TEXT = #{inquireInfoText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRE_INFO_ALL = #{inquireInfoAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CONCLUSION_TEXT = #{fieldConclusionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD_CONCLUSION_PHOTO = #{fieldConclusionPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACE = #{trace ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACKING_TIME = #{trackingTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARRIVAL_TIME = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AGREEMENT_CONTENT = #{agreementContent ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGREEMENT_AMOUNT = #{agreementAmount ,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT H.* FROM(SELECT A.CLAIM_NO, A.CLAIM_STATE, A.MILL_SHEET_NO, A.CUSTOMER_NAME, B.DEPT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.DESIGNATION, A.SIZE_MARK, A.CLAIM_TYPE, A.OBJECTION_NUM, C.PRESENTATION_DATE, C.ADMISSIBILITY_TIME, A.INQUIRE_STATE, D.CREATE_BY AS EXTERNAL_LNVESTIGATOR, D.CREATE_DT AS EXTERNAL_LNVESTIGATION_DATE, D.FOLLOW_REASON, E.CREATE_BY AS INTERNAL_LNVESTIGATOR, E.CREATE_DT AS INTERNAL_LNVESTIGATION_DATE, (select T.TYPE_NAME from sgai_md_common_type t WHERE T.SID=(select T.PARENT_SID from sgai_md_common_type t WHERE T.TYPE_NAME=E.ZCPMC)) AS ZCPMC, (select T.PARENT_SID from sgai_md_common_type t WHERE T.SID=(select T.PARENT_SID from sgai_md_common_type t WHERE T.TYPE_NAME=E.ZCPMC)) AS PARENT_SID, E.ZPH FROM WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INFO A LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_APPLY C ON A.CLAIM_NO = C.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_OUT_INQUIRE D ON A.CLAIM_NO = D.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE E ON A.CLAIM_NO = E.CLAIM_NO LEFT JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HEAD E ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = E.MILL_SHEET_NO ) H
AND H.CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
